member.name: IAppxDigestProvider.GetDigest
member.summary: Retrieves the digest representation of the app packaging object managed by the associated interface.
member.param: Receives a pointer to an LPWSTR containing the digest representation of the app packaging object object managed by the associated interface.

member.name: IAppxDigestProvider
member.summary: Provides APIs for retrieving the digest string representation of an app packaging object.
